document_data.name: Bara Minora
document_data.mainbody: '''Bara Minora''' was a [[halfling]] who worked and cared for [[Hama Sayif]] within the [[Grand Bazaar]] of [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities: Bara played her [[drum]]s while Hama performed his mystical dances. She also took care off all haggling for Hama's customers.
document_data.Relationships:
Bara's mate was [[Sika al-Bana]].

Bara had been with Hama ever since he saved the lives of she and her mate in [[Al-Akara Mountains]].
document_data.History: Hama once cursed Bara with the [[evil eye]] when he caught her lifting the purse from one of his customers.
